banner.title: Industry application of blockchain for trade finance
banner.subTitle: Trade Finance is an industry that got benefited tremendously from Blockchain Technology â€“ due to the Trust and Proof of Work

statements: No proof of work or transparency in the pricing over the journey of a product from the manufacturer to the buyer as multiple stakeholders pass-on the invoice at different stages
Lack of ability by prevailing industry applications to handle multiple data touch points and make those data available on one single platform
Different stakeholders using different software to handle the same invoice even within the organization. Most of the work ends up on being on physical papers
Different stakeholders using different software to handle the same invoice even within the organization. Most of the work ends up on being on physical papers

workflow.title: Created a single database with the help of blockchain technology to track the invoices

solution.title: Created a single database with the help of blockchain technology to track the invoices

techstack.title: Created a single database with the help of blockchain technology to track the invoices

techstacks.title: CSS3
techstacks.subTitle: SCSS, BEM Mobile first critical rendering

keyHighlightsData: Eased stakeholders for tracking the invoice and handle it without actually tempering the data
Aggregated all the data touch point on a single database making it flawless to identify and move transactions fasters
Created a proof of work to identify the market value of the same commodity at various touch stages of transaction and timelines
